name: SuperThief
description: Welcome at Super Thiefs! For years there is a wrangle between the Raccoons and the Lions. Randy Raccoon wants to take back the lions, that’s why he went to work at supermarket Five Lions. The manager of the supermarket is Leonard Lion. Randy wants to steal money from leonard to take him back. While products come by sometimes there is a bag of money which he puts in his own pocket. But he have to do it secretly so that leonard can’t see it. And if you miss products he will get fired. Can you mislead Leonard? Can you scan all the products when speed increase? Compete with all your friends and see who can get the highest score.
